Name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
Title: Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage
Desc: ...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Cicin Mage

C124041.Name: Electro Cicin
C124041.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K104].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your opponent plays a total of 3 Action Cards:</color> This card gains 1 $[K3]. (Max 3 stacks)
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After $[A2404] takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> This card loses 1 $[K3].

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

24043.Name: Thundering Shield
24043.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], applies $[K204] to this character, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124042]</color> and prepares <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24044]</color>.

K204.Name: <color=#FFACFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro Application</color>
K204.Desc:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

C124042.Name: Electro Cicin Ward
C124042.Desc: Provides <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6] point</color> for your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When created:</color> If you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color> on the field, additionally increase $[K6] by the amount of $[K3] it has. (Adds a maximum of 3 additional $[K6])

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
